verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: to Twitter] [ARGM-PRP: to celebrate news that the leaders of the two Koreas have agreed to end the Korean War , 68 years after it began] .

President Donald Trump took to Twitter to celebrate news that [ARG0: the leaders of the two Koreas] have [V: agreed] [ARG1: to end the Korean War , 68 years after it began] .
President Donald Trump took to Twitter to celebrate news that [ARG0: the leaders of the two Koreas] have agreed to [V: end] [ARG1: the Korean War] , [ARGM-TMP: 68 years after it began] .
President Donald Trump took to Twitter to celebrate news that the leaders of the two Koreas have agreed to end the Korean War , 68 years after [ARG1: it] [V: began] .
